queries.getSysParam: FROM ParamsEntity WHERE 1 = 1 <#if paramName??&&paramName!=''> AND paramName = :paramName </#if> <#if keyword??&&keyword!=''> AND ( UPPER(paramName) like :keyword OR UPPER(paramDesc) like :keyword OR UPPER(paramValue) like :keyword ) </#if> <#if paramDesc??> AND paramDesc = :paramDesc </#if> <#if paramStatus??> AND paramStatus =:paramStatus </#if> <#if paramValue??> AND paramValue =:paramValue </#if> order by createDate,lastUpdDate desc
queries.getCode: FROM CodeEntity WHERE 1=1 <#if codeType??> AND codeType = :codeType </#if> <#if codeId?? > AND codeId =:codeId </#if> <#if codeKey?? && codeKey!!=''> AND codeKey =:codeKey </#if> <#if codeStatus?? && codeStatus!!=''> AND codeStatus = :codeStatus </#if> <#if codeCname?? && codeCname!!=''> AND LOWER(codeCname) LIKE LOWER(:codeCname) </#if> <#if codePrintCname?? && codePrintCname!!=''> AND LOWER(codePrintCname) LIKE LOWER(:codePrintCname) </#if> <#if codePname?? && codePname!!=''> AND LOWER(codePname) LIKE LOWER(:codePname) </#if> <#if codePrintPname?? && codePrintPname!!=''> AND LOWER(codePrintPname) LIKE LOWER(:codePrintPname) </#if> ORDER BY codeOrder,codeKey
queries.getCodeByTypeAndKey: FROM CodeEntity WHERE codeType = :codeType AND codeKey = :codeKey <#if codeId??> AND codeId <> :codeId </#if>
queries.getCodeMaster: FROM CodeMasterEntity WHERE 1=1 <#if codeMasterType??> AND codeMasterType = :codeMasterType </#if> <#if codeMasterCname?? && codeMasterCname!!=''> AND LOWER(codeMasterCname) LIKE :codeMasterCname </#if> <#if codeMasterPname?? && codeMasterPname!!=''> AND LOWER(codeMasterPname) LIKE :codeMasterPname </#if> ORDER BY codeMasterType
queries.getCodeByCodeTypes: from CodeEntity where codeType in (:codeTypes) and codeKey=:codeKey
queries.selectSysCode: SELECT new Map( codeKey AS id, codeCname AS cname, codePname AS pname, codeKey+' - '+codePname+' - '+codeCname AS description ) FROM CodeEntity WHERE 1 = 1 AND codeStatus = 'A' <#if codeType??> AND codeType = CAST(:codeType AS integer) </#if> <#if codeTypes??> AND codeType IN (:codeTypes) </#if> <#if queryString??&&queryString!!=''> AND ( UPPER(codeKey) LIKE UPPER(:queryString) OR codeCname LIKE :queryString OR UPPER(codePname) LIKE UPPER(:queryString) ) </#if> ORDER BY codeOrder
queries.selectSysCode4show: SELECT new Map( codeKey AS id, codeCname AS cname, codePname AS pname, codeKey+' - '+codePname+' - '+codeCname AS description ) FROM CodeEntity WHERE 1 = 1 AND (codeStatus = 'A' OR codeStatus = 'C') <#if codeType??> AND codeType = CAST(:codeType AS integer) </#if> <#if codeTypes??> AND codeType IN (:codeTypes) </#if> <#if queryString??&&queryString!!=''> AND ( UPPER(codeKey) LIKE UPPER(:queryString) OR codeCname LIKE :queryString OR UPPER(codePname) LIKE UPPER(:queryString) ) </#if> ORDER BY codeOrder
queries.selectSysCodeList:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER()over(ORDER BY code_type, ISNULL(code_order, 999999), code_key) as num, code_Key AS "id", dbo.FUNC_CODE_DESC(code_type, code_Key,'A') AS "text", code_pname AS "pname", code_cname AS "cname" FROM IRD_SYS_CODE WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE code_status in ('A'<#if includeCancel?? >,'C'</#if>) <#if codeType!!=''> AND code_type = :codeType </#if> <#if codeIds??> AND code_Key in (:codeIds) </#if> <#if codeTypes??> AND code_type IN (:codeTypes) </#if>
<#if keyword!!='' && codeTypeFilter?? > AND UPPER(code_key) LIKE UPPER(:keyword) </#if> <#if keyword!!=''> AND ( UPPER(code_key) LIKE UPPER(:keyword) OR code_cname LIKE :keyword OR UPPER(code_pname) LIKE UPPER(:keyword) ) </#if> <#if filterCodeKeys??> AND code_key not in (:filterCodeKeys) </#if> ) vsc
queries.selectLocation: SELECT to_char(code) AS "id", pt + ' - ' + zh AS "text", pt AS "pname", zh AS "cname" FROM DSAT_LOCATION_TYPE_VW WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 <#if code??> AND code = :code </#if> <#if keyword!!=''> AND ( zh LIKE :keyword OR UPPER(pt) LIKE UPPER(:keyword) ) </#if>
queries.selectStreet: SELECT to_char(code) AS "id", pt + ' - ' + zh AS "text", pt AS "pname", zh AS "cname" FROM DSAT_STREET_INFO_VW WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE TO_CHAR(location) = :locationCode <#if code??> AND code = :code </#if> <#if keyword!!=''> AND ( zh LIKE :keyword OR UPPER(pt) LIKE UPPER(:keyword) ) </#if>
queries.selectBuilding: SELECT to_char(b.code) AS "id", b.pt + ' - ' + b.zh AS "text", b.pt AS "pname", b.zh AS "cname" FROM dsat_building_street_info_vw a WITH (NOLOCK), dsat_building_info_vw b WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE a.building_code = b.code AND a.street_code = :streetCode <#if code??> AND code = :code </#if> <#if keyword!!=''> AND ( zh LIKE :keyword OR UPPER(pt) LIKE UPPER(:keyword) ) </#if>
queries.getAllParams: select param_name AS "paramName" , param_desc AS "paramDesc" , param_status AS "paramStatus", param_value AS "paramValue" FROM IRD_SYS_PARAMS WITH (NOLOCK)
queries.getAuthorization: FROM AuthorizationEntity WHERE 1=1 <#if spNo?? && spNo!!=''> AND spNo = :spNo </#if> <#if licNo?? && licNo!!=''> AND licNo = :licNo </#if> <#if licType?? && licType!!=''> AND licType = :licType </#if> <#if processId??> AND processId = :processId </#if> <#if authItem?? && authItem!!=''> AND authItem = :authItem </#if> <#if authItemKey?? && authItemKey!!=''> AND authItemKey = :authItemKey </#if> <#if authTime??> AND TRUNC(authTime) = :authTime </#if>
queries.getIdentTypeSysCode: select v.code_key from IRD_SYS_CODE v WITH (NOLOCK) where v.CODE_STATUS = 'A' and v.code_type in ('31001','50062','50069','50084')
queries.getLangSysCode: select v.code_key from IRD_SYS_CODE v WITH (NOLOCK) where v.CODE_STATUS = 'A' and v.code_type = '60104'
queries.getSysCodeForAppointment: SELECT CODE_KEY as "code", CODE_CNAME as "text" FROM IRD_SYS_CODE WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE CODE_TYPE = '911001' AND CODE_STATUS = 'A' order by CODE_ORDER
queries.batchGetSysCodeByCodeTypes: SELECT * FROM IRD_SYS_CODE WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE CODE_STATUS = 'A' AND CODE_TYPE IN (:codeTypes) ORDER BY CODE_TYPE ASC, CODE_ORDER ASC
